content: i hope this will be a sweet gift for a baby of yours you will get 3 different pdf s one separate for each size as a designer one thing i try is not only offer basic instructions but detailed ones for this baby cardigan i had to write my sizes one by one as the ripple pattern slightly changes from size to size this pattern is worked from the top down starting with the neckline there is no seaming or tricky assembly and it s a repetitive pattern once you get the hang of the first 4 row you will be all set needs about 7 hours this listing is for a crochet pattern in pdf format level intermediate sizes 0-6mo/ 6-18mo/ 2-4yrs finished measurements neckline perimeter chest circumference length 0-6 mo 9 44 24cm 15 38cm 7 18 cm 6-18 mo 13 38 34cm 17 30 44cm 8 66 22cm 2-4 years 15 70 40 cm 20 50cm 10 23 26cm materials needed -us size g/6 4 mm crochet hook - worsted yarn approximately 0-6 mo 250yds 6-18 mo 280yds 2-4 years 300 yds i used debbie bliss cashmerino aran 50g 98yds 90m
